name: Warpath (itch)
description:
Warpath is a real-time strategy game targeting e-sport fans and focused on micro-management. Warpath aims to emphasize spur-of-the-moment tactical decisions over predetermined strategies.

The game takes place on a sea of clouds moving at the wind's mercy which makes for fast-paced and one-shot games.

Inspired by Native American myths, a game of Warpath throws players in a race to earn the Great Manitous' favours, the ancient divinities who will turn the tides of battle by altering the sea of clouds.

Any question or comment? Contact us at warpath.thegame@gmail.com
